nodes.text: Trass was a female Bothan spy and a member of a resistance group on a backwater planet. She took part in the mission to Sunfall Peak in 0 ABY. She cased the Imperial communications hub weeks before the raid.

Trass appears in the opening short story of the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2014. She was also later used as a player's character in an example of gameplay given later in the book.
